info.name: Settings
info.description: This will contain all the admin section APIs which comes under Settings menu.

graphql.query:
mutation createRole {
    createRole(input: {
        name: "Custom Role name afd"
        description: "Custom Role Description"
        permissionType: "custom"
        permissions: [
            "catalog",
            "catalog.families",
            "catalog.families.edit",
            "customers",
            "customers.customers",
            "customers.customers.create",
            "customers.customers.delete",
            "customers.groups",
            "customers.groups.create",
            "customers.groups.edit",
            "customers.groups.delete",
            "customers.reviews",
            "customers.reviews.edit",
            "customers.reviews.delete"
        ]
    }) {
        id
        name
        description
        permissionType
        permissions
    }
}

mutation updateRole {
    updateRole(id: 2, input: {
        name: "Custom"
        description: "Custom Description"
        permissionType: "custom"
        permissions: [
            "catalog",
            "catalog.families",
            "catalog.families.edit",
            "customers",
            "customers.customers",
            "customers.customers.create",
            "customers.customers.delete",
            "customers.groups",
            "customers.groups.create",
            "customers.groups.edit",
            "customers.groups.delete",
            "customers.reviews",
            "customers.reviews.edit",
            "customers.reviews.delete"
        ]
    }) {
        id
        name
        description
        permissionType
        permissions
    }
}

query inventorySources {
    inventorySources {
        paginatorInfo {
            count
            currentPage
            lastPage
            total
        }
        data {
            id
            code
            name
            description
            contactName
            contactEmail
            contactNumber
            contactFax
            country
            state
            city
            street
            postcode
            priority
            latitude
            longitude
            status
        }
    }
}

query inventorySource {
    inventorySource(id: 1) {
        id
        code
        name
        description
        contactName
        contactEmail
        contactNumber
        contactFax
        country
        state
        city
        street
        postcode
        priority
        latitude
        longitude
        status
    }
}

mutation createInventorySource {
    createInventorySource(input: {
        code: "ncr",
        name: "NCRStore",
        contactName: "TomMartin",
        contactEmail: "tom_martin@example.com",
        contactNumber: "4792645441",
        contactFax: "676767",
        street: "1217 Ocello Street",
        country: "US",
        state: "Arkansas",
        city: "HARRELL",
        postcode: "71745",
        priority: 3,
        latitude: "123.123.123.123",
        longitude: "444.444.444.444",
        status: false
    }) {
        id
        code
        name
        description
        contactName
        contactEmail
        contactNumber
        contactFax
        country
        state
        city
        street
        postcode
        priority
        latitude
        longitude
        status
    }
}

mutation updateInventorySource {
    updateInventorySource(id: 2, input: {
        code: "ncr",
        name: "NCR Store",
        contactName: "Tom Martin",
        contactEmail: "tom@example.com",
        contactNumber: "479-264-5441",
        contactFax: "676767",
        street: "1217 Ocello Street",
        country: "US",
        state: "Arkansas",
        city: "HARRELL",
        postcode: "71745",
        priority: 2,
        latitude: "444.444.444.444",
        longitude: "123.123.123.123",
        status: true
    }) {
        id
        code
        name
        description
        contactName
        contactEmail
        contactNumber
        contactFax
        country
        state
        city
        street
        postcode
        priority
        latitude
        longitude
        status
    }
}

query channels {
    channels {
        paginatorInfo {
            count
            currentPage
            lastPage
            total
        }
        data {
            id
            code
            name
            description
            theme
            homePageContent
            footerContent
            hostname
            defaultLocaleId
            baseCurrencyId
            rootCategoryId
            homeSeo
            locales {
                id
                name
                code
                direction
            }
            defaultLocale
            currencies {
                id
                name
                code
                symbol
            }
            inventorySources {
                id
                code
                name
                description
                contactName
                contactEmail
                contactNumber
                contactFax
                country
                state
                city
                street
                postcode
                priority
                latitude
                longitude
                status
            }
            baseCurrency
            rootCategory
            logoUrl
            faviconUrl
        }
    }
}

query channel {
    channel(id: 1) {
        id
        code
        name
        description
        theme
        homePageContent
        footerContent
        hostname
        defaultLocaleId
        baseCurrencyId
        rootCategoryId
        homeSeo
        locales {
            id
            name
            code
            direction
        }
        defaultLocale
        currencies {
            id
            name
            code
            symbol
        }
        inventorySources {
            id
            code
            name
            description
            contactName
            contactEmail
            contactNumber
            contactFax
            country
            state
            city
            street
            postcode
            priority
            latitude
            longitude
            status
        }
        baseCurrency
        rootCategory
        logoUrl
        faviconUrl
    }
}

query sliders {
    sliders {
        paginatorInfo {
            count
            currentPage
            lastPage
            total
        }
        data {
            id
            title
            path
            imageUrl
            content
            channelId
            locale
            sliderPath
            imgPath
            channel {
                id
                code
                name
                description
                theme
                homePageContent
                footerContent
                hostname
                defaultLocaleId
                baseCurrencyId
                rootCategoryId
                homeSeo
                locales {
                    id
                    name
                    code
                    direction
                }
                defaultLocale
                currencies {
                    id
                    name
                    code
                    symbol
                }
                inventorySources {
                    id
                    code
                    name
                    description
                    contactName
                    contactEmail
                    contactNumber
                    contactFax
                    country
                    state
                    city
                    street
                    postcode
                    priority
                    latitude
                    longitude
                    status
                }
                baseCurrency
                rootCategory
                logoUrl
                faviconUrl
            }
        }
    }
}

query slider {
    slider(id: 28){
        id
        title
        path
        content
        channelId
        locale
        sliderPath
        imgPath
        channel{
            id
            code
            name
            description
            theme
            homePageContent
            footerContent
            hostname
            defaultLocaleId
            baseCurrencyId
            rootCategoryId
            homeSeo
            locales{
                id
                name
                code
                direction
            }
            defaultLocale
            currencies{
                id
                name
                code
                symbol
            }
            inventorySources{
                id
                code
                name
                description
                contactName
                contactEmail
                contactNumber
                contactFax
                country
                state
                city
                street
                postcode
                priority
                latitude
                longitude
                status
            }
            baseCurrency
            rootCategory
            logoUrl
            faviconUrl
        }
    }
}

mutation createSlider {
    createSlider(input: {
        title: "fdasasf"
        channelId: 1
        expiredAt: "2022-08-31"
        locale: "ar,arb,nl,en,fr"
        image:
            "https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2017/05/23/10/53/t-shirt-design-2336850_960_720.jpg"
    
        sortOrder: 1
        content: "fasdfasfas"
        sliderPath: "fdasfasfasf"
    }){
        id
            title
            path
            content
            channelId
            locale
            sliderPath
            imgPath
            channel {
                id
                code
                name
                description
                theme
                homePageContent
                footerContent
                hostname
                defaultLocaleId
                baseCurrencyId
                rootCategoryId
                homeSeo
                locales {
                    id
                    name
                    code
                    direction
                }
                defaultLocale
                currencies {
                    id
                    name
                    code
                    symbol
                }
                inventorySources {
                    id
                    code
                    name
                    description
                    contactName
                    contactEmail
                    contactNumber
                    contactFax
                    country
                    state
                    city
                    street
                    postcode
                    priority
                    latitude
                    longitude
                    status
                }
                baseCurrency
                rootCategory
                logoUrl
                faviconUrl
            }
    }
}
